item.title: Introduction
item.description: If you’re visiting this page, it means you’re likely a founder or VC interested in working with me. I’m going to use this document to describe how I choose projects and split my work between advisory work and consulting. If it all makes sense, shoot me an email at hello@nirantk.com. Picking Projects # I prioritize projects based on three key factors: High-Value Projects: I seek projects that leverage my expertise and create significant impact for founders, and in return, equitable compensation.
